name: Custom Emote Wheel
description: Unleash your personality with a wide array of custom emotes, easily accessible through an intuitive emote wheel.

name: Long Arms Mod
description: Gain a strategic advantage with extended arm reach, perfect for climbing and tagging opponents from a distance.

name: Speed Boost Ability
description: Traverse maps at incredible speeds, outmaneuvering your rivals with a temporary burst of speed.

name: ii stupid mod menu
description: Access a variety of fun and useful client-side modifications to enhance your gameplay experience.

name: Winter Wonderland Map
description: A festive, snow-covered map designed for the Winter 2024 update, featuring new climbing routes and hidden areas.

name: Mod Checking System
description: Ensures fair play by checking for unauthorized modifications, maintaining a balanced competitive environment.
